document.full_text: when the internet world's titans alight in paris next week for a two-day forum hosted by french president nicolas sarkozy, two often clashing views on the digital world will be on display.
document.title: sarkozy enlists tech a-list for web economy forum
lines_and_colors: when the internet world's titans alight in paris next week for a two-day forum hosted by french president nicolas sarkozy, two often clashing views on the digital world will be on display.
